titleStmt.title: The reply of Richard Peirce farmer of the duties of package, scavage, balliage and portage; to a paper intituled, The case of Thomas Kilner relating to the duties of package, scavage, &c. lately industriuously dispersed.
titleStmt.author: Peirce, Richard.

notesStmt.note: With docket title: The reply of Richard Peirce the present farmer of the scavage duties, to Kilner's case.
On verso: The case of Richard Peirce ..; docket title below.
Copy has extreme print showthrough on both sides.
Reproduction of the original at the Harvard University Library.
